schema.name: PROVIDER TAXONOMY DESCRIPTION CLASSIFICATION and SPECIALIZATION

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code } as string,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCContractCategoryCode
SRCContractCategoryCode sink(input(
		ContractCategoryCode_Key as integer,
		ContractCategoryCode as string,
		ContractCategoryCodedesC as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ContractCategoryCode = {Code },
		ContractCategoryCodedesC = Description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimContractCategoryCode

source(output(
		{PK�� ���!�ï¿½+t} as string

		ph_varchar2 as string,

		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,

source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> SRCEnrollmentContract
SRCEnrollmentContract sink(input(
		EnrollmentContract_Key as integer,
		Enrollment_Contract_ID as string,
		Contract_Number as string,
		Contract_Desc as string,
		Contract_Category_Code as string,
		LineofBusinessCodeCatCode as string,
		LineofBusinessCodeSubCatCode as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Enrollment_Contract_ID = Column_1,
		Contract_Number = Column_2,
		Contract_Desc = Column_3,
		Contract_Category_Code = Column_4,
		LineofBusinessCodeCatCode = Column_5,
		LineofBusinessCodeSubCatCode = Column_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimEnrollmentContract

source(output(
		Plan_Benefit_ID as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		Plan_Benefit_Description as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as boolean,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		Benefit_Plan_Type_Code as short,
		Population_Category_Code as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCPlanBenefits
SRCPlanBenefits sink(input(
		PlanBenefits_Key as integer,
		Plan_Benefit_ID as string,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date as date,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date as date,
		Plan_Benefit_Desp as string,
		LineofBusinessCodeCatCode as string,
		Plan_Product_Code as string,
		BenefitPlanTypeCode as string,
		PopulationCatCode as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Plan_Benefit_ID,
		Plan_Benefit_Start_Date,
		Plan_Benefit_End_Date,
		Plan_Benefit_Desp = Plan_Benefit_Description,
		LineofBusinessCodeCatCode = {Line_Of_Business                  },
		Plan_Product_Code = {Plan_Product_Code                 },
		BenefitPlanTypeCode = Benefit_Plan_Type_Code,
		PopulationCatCode = Population_Category_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimPlanBenefits
